transcript:
Customer: Kaun sa?
Customer: Kaun sa? Accha sir, iske liye aayega feedback. A close ke andar call kaise hua?
Customer: Baat ho gayi?
Customer: To close nahi hogi na?
Customer: Try karo close hi nahi hoga.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Yeah.
Executive: Haan Sanjay sahab, Himanshu this side from IndiaMART sir. How are you?
Customer: Very good evening.
Executive: Good evening. Yeah. I just called you regarding the services feedback. So what you are facing the problem here sir? Because I got
Customer: Kya hua abhi aapko main deeply explain karta hu. Subah mere ko aap
Customer: Hi.
Customer: Kya keh raha hai?
Customer: Subah mere ko aapka phone aaya tha. Company ka aadmi baat kar raha tha. Lakshman Lakshman right Lakshman ne call kiya tha aapko.
Customer: I don't I have no ask uska main naam bhul gaya pucha nahi.
Executive: Your new account manager has called you right.
Customer: Yeah. Okay usme kya uska discuss kar raha tha regarding lead consume nahi kar rahe bolke. Okay.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: To hum log lead baad me hum log open karke do lead consume karne ke liye try kiya. Ek ko humne call kiya. Iske pehle usko bhi main bola tha ke there are lot of fake caller coming inquiry aa raha hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Ek aapne purchase kiya ek ek aapne kiya sofa cum bed ka.
Customer: Haan subah wo sofa cum bed ka hi consume kiya and I have shared the number to him. Actually mere ko share karne ka jarurat nahi aapko pura dikhta hai udhar.
Executive: Okay. Ji ji ji. Nahi dikhta.
Customer: Customer number nahi dikhta. Number nahi dikhta sir hame nahi to matlab wo jayega na privacy glitch ho jayegi. Nahi number nahi dikhta. Ek hi consume kiya aapne but number details nahi dikhta hame.
Customer: Accha maine usko detail de diya tha. Okay number bhi de diya tha. Aise dena nahi chahiye tha.
Customer: Main call karta hu isliye baad me usne mere ko bola pura explain kiya. To uske samne hi baad me do minute me phone kiya usko bol ki this is a procedure ye hum log customer ne bola hai ki we have not inquiry ye ek nahi do ke bahut baar hua mere ko.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To wo mere ko explain karne laga. He was explaining nahi baat suno. Baat suno mere baat. Wo bola do din ka pehle consume kiya do din pehle ka inquiry tha. Okay. To liya rahega. Main bola okay liya riya to okay. To the customer has told me that I am not hum log gaya hi nahi IndiaMART site pe aur aapka number kidhar se aaya mere ko malum. Main bolne laga we have not inquiry sorry bolke mere ko phone cut kar diya mera. Okay.
Executive: Accha.
Customer: This was issue.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai wo main aapko check karwa lunga lead ka. To you have to called us now sir. You have called us regarding the same you given us the feedback right.
Customer: Dekho bhai dekho abhi ye sab leke baithne ke liye time hota hai usko. Isliye do teen char baar kiya to baad me hum log bhi kantala aata hai na ye kya follow up karne ka aisa reply aata hai. To there is something wrong side from your side aisa dikh raha hai humko. Aur baad me beech me do mahina dedh mahine pehle mere ko aur ek isne phone kiya tha ki main aapko explain karta hu. What he has told me ek minute ha.
Customer: IndiaMART pe lead manager pe jao bola.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aur click more. Okay.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Baad me direct pe jao bola aur apply karo aur click click catalog. Okay. To jo kisne inquiry kiya us pe direct whatsapp pe chala jayega bola. Okay.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Wo bhi hum log try kiya kafi time.
Executive: Hmm. Wo bhi usme bhi doesn't make any issue wo bol raha hai wo bhi nahi hai. Aisa nahi ho raha hai. To usme bhi response nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Samajh gaya na aap main kya bol raha hu.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji.
Customer: Isliye ye dikkat aa raha hai humko.
Executive: Theek hai ek na main aap se matlab video meeting arrange kar lo monday ke din ka. Theek hai sir.
Customer: Haan. Haan. Uh monday ke din ka na video meeting arrange kar lete hai waha pe jo bhi aapki doubts hai ek baar apne team ke sath main jo senior unke sath. Nahi mere ko doubt maine aapko bol diya you speak to your higher authority mera aisa aisa aisa customer ko aisa hua. Correction correction on the call hi karwa lenge sir on the call hi correction karwa lenge. Kyunki mere ko leke baad me wapis ek aadha ghanta 15 minute lo time consume hota hai aapka bhi time consume hoga mera bhi time consumption hoega.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Samajh gaye na aap main kya bol raha hu. On the call hi jo bhi correction wagera hai wo karwa lunga sir aur kaisa kya hai wo bata dega. Nahi nahi aap bol rahe hai dekho aap bol rahe hai ki hamara jo inquiry hai wo number view nahi ho raha hai. Okay. Lekin kafi baar ek ek baar aapka phone aata hai to bolta hai humko itna lead humne diya itna discount so number bhi view ho raha hai bolte hai.
Executive: Accha. To main isko karwa ke deta hu changes.
Customer: Okay. Okay. Thank you.
Executive: Theek hai to main aapko mera number save kar lijiye aur kabhi feedback ke liye humko feedback dega uska feedback hame de dijiyega aur ye correction wagera. Abhi wapis feedback diya diya na maine to feedback. Haan haan aap mat dena aap mat dena matlab feedback in the sense ki positive ki baat kar raha hu mere ko. Dekho kya hota hai dekho jaise isme barabar theek hona manta hai no doubt aap main na nahi bol raha hu ki 100% hota hai at least we expect something 15 20 30% business milna manta hai aur kafi lead bahar se aata hai Jammu Kashmir se aata hai Maharashtra aata hai aur kidhar Bihar se aata hai we are not interested in that lead. Samajh gaya na?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To unnecessary mere ko dikhta hai ye log baba aapka company ka policy rahega. Accha baba isko 10 lead idhar se bhejo panch lead udhar se bhej do. Automatic consume hone ke baad aur demand karenge aur hum log paisa mangenge. Aisa hamare ko dikh raha hai back of mind.
Executive: Hmm. Ye wo voice mera recording ho raha hai aapko abhi?
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji. Ye jo main bol raha hu wo recording ho raha hai aapko isme company. Haan haan ho raha hai. Bilkul ho raha hai. Haan to usko bol dena ki customer aisa bol raha tha. Ji ji ji. Haan. You should rectify kyunki mere ko aage ja ke baad me main renew karu na karu agar mere ko business nahi mil raha hai to I will be not much interested in this. Nahi wo karwa ke dunga sir jo. Kyunki abhi wo starting me bol raha mere ko do hi mahina hua aapko abhi lead aayega main do teen baar follow up kiya baad me main bhi bolo chhodo. Abhi mera renew kabhi hua kabhi hum log ye kiya tha activate kiya tha aapka. Date yaad hai yaad aaya aapko. Hmm. Hello. Ji. Activate kabhi hua tha ye? Ye aapka last year hua tha. Last year? Haan last year kiya tha na ek saal ka sir aapne. Nahi nahi nahi nahi aapke paas bhi galat information hai to. Okay. Thank you. Thank you. Ek second sir ek second main check kar leta hu. Bina dekha aapne direct bol diya last year.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving fake inquiries.

- Number is not visible to the customer.

- Customer is not interested in leads from other states.

- Customer is not getting enough business.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check the lead issue.

- Executive offered a video meeting on Monday.

- Executive will get the number visibility issue resolved.



Next Steps: 

- Video meeting to be scheduled on Monday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, fake inquiries, number visibility, video meeting
